advisories.impact: An attacker in a privileged network position may be able to intercept network traffic
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by using HTTPS when sending information over the network.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access contacts
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: ZiMing Zeng(@hluwa) of iJiami Technology Co. Ltd (ijiami.cn)
